content.raw:
I think this is ok.  With this added bias we can simulate a random walk effect better. Maybe quatization should be outside the noise tag and inside the sensor tag if it is going to affect the measurement and not the noise.  

I had other ideas, like have different noises in the same measurement and be able to increase stddev based on a parameter \(time, temperature, radiation, GPS HDOP\), but I think those can be implemented on demand or be implemented in ign-sensor with the sensor configuration.
content.html:
I think this is ok. With this added bias we can simulate a random walk effect better. Maybe quatization should be outside the noise tag and inside the sensor tag if it is going to affect the measurement and not the noise.

I had other ideas, like have different noises in the same measurement and be able to increase stddev based on a parameter (time, temperature, radiation, GPS HDOP), but I think those can be implemented on demand or be implemented in ign-sensor with the sensor configuration.
